attributes.action: do more for young homeless young people and ensure that they are not pushed from service to serivce and make it a law that who every they go to  for assistance has to take responsibility for them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people who find themselves homeless often have to wait weeks to be assessed in order to get interim accomadation. However in the meantime they are put at risk by not having a safe and secure place to sleep. When they turn up to services they are often toldto go to different services and no one wants to take responsibility for them
